Class CompanyRepresentativeController

java.lang.Object
src.controller.CompanyRepresentativeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthController, IReportGenerator
public class CompanyRepresentativeController extends Object implements AuthController, IReportGenerator
Controller used by company representatives to manage internships and applications.

Responsibilities include account creation for company reps, authentication, creating/editing/deleting internships, approving/rejecting applications, and generating reports.

    • setCurrentCompanyRepresentative

      public void setCurrentCompanyRepresentative(CompanyRepresentative c)
      Sets the currently authenticated company representative.

    • getCurrentCompayRepresentative

      public CompanyRepresentative getCurrentCompayRepresentative()
      Returns the currently authenticated company representative.
      Returns:
      the current `CompanyRepresentative`, or null if none

    • createCompanyRepresentative

      public boolean createCompanyRepresentative(String userId, String password, String name, String email, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Creates a new company representative account and registers it in the data store.
      Parameters:
      userId - desired user id
      password - account password
      name - full name
      email - contact email
      companyName - company name
      department - company department
      position - position/title
      Returns:
      true if account created, false if user id already exists

    • login

      public LoginResult login(String userName, String pw)
      Attempts to authenticate a company representative.
      Specified by:
      login in interface AuthController
      Parameters:
      userName - representative user id
      pw - plaintext password to verify
      Returns:
      `LoginResult` indicating success or failure reason

    • logout

      Logs out the currently authenticated company representative.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String oldPW, String newPW)
      Updates the password for the currently authenticated company representative.
      Specified by:
      updatePassword in interface AuthController
      Parameters:
      oldPW - existing password for verification
      newPW - new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated, false otherwise

    • getApplications

      public ArrayList<InternshipApplication> getApplications()
      Returns all internship applications addressed to the currently authenticated company representative.
      Returns:
      list of `InternshipApplication` objects for the current representative

    • getInternships

      public ArrayList<Internship> getInternships()
      Returns internships created by the currently authenticated company representative.
      Returns:
      list of `Internship` objects owned by the current representative

    • createInternship

      public boolean createInternship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel internshipLevel, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int numberOfSlotsLeft)
      Creates a new internship for the current company representative.
      Parameters:
      title - internship title
      description - internship description
      internshipLevel - level of internship
      major - targeted major
      openDate - opening date for applications
      closeDate - closing date for applications
      numberOfSlotsLeft - number of available slots
      Returns:
      true if created, false when representative has reached allowed limit

    • approveInternshipApplication

      public boolean approveInternshipApplication(InternshipApplication app)
      Approves a student's internship application.
      Parameters:
      app - the `InternshipApplication` to approve
      Returns:
      true when operation succeeds

    • rejectInternshipApplication

      public boolean rejectInternshipApplication(InternshipApplication app)
      Rejects a student's internship application and removes it from records.
      Parameters:
      app - the `InternshipApplication` to reject
      Returns:
      true when operation succeeds

    • editInternship

      public boolean editInternship(Internship internship, String title, String description, InternshipLevel internshipLevel, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int numberOfSlotsLeft)
      Edits an existing internship's metadata. Approved internships cannot be edited.
      Parameters:
      internship - the `Internship` to edit
      title - new title
      description - new description
      internshipLevel - new level
      major - new major
      openDate - new open date
      closeDate - new close date
      numberOfSlotsLeft - new number of slots
      Returns:
      true if the internship was edited, false if it was approved and thus locked

    • deleteInternship

      public boolean deleteInternship(Internship internship)
      Deletes an internship if it has not been approved. This removes it from both the company representative and the data store.
      Parameters:
      internship - the `Internship` to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion succeeded, false if internship is approved

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(Internship internship)
      Toggles the visibility flag of the given internship.
      Parameters:
      internship - the `Internship` to toggle visibility for
      Returns:
      true after toggling

    • generateReport

      public List<Internship> generateReport(ReportCriteria criteria)
      Generates a report of internships according to the provided criteria.
      Specified by:
      generateReport in interface IReportGenerator
      Parameters:
      criteria - the `ReportCriteria` used to filter and sort internships
      Returns:
      list of internships matching the criteria

    • printReport

      public void printReport(List<Internship> internships)
      Prints a simple textual report to standard output for the provided internships.
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internships to print
